EmailTemplate.description: Provided activation ID is already used so kindly fill the details again which will generate new Activation ID.
EmailTemplate.name: Generate New Activation ID
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
The Activation ID provided by you is already in use on another system. Please go to the following link, fill in the required details, and click Submit:
https://www.invixium.com/download-ixm-web/
Please note that each Activation ID is uniquely linked to the IXM WEB instance provided that is activated upon filling the details. To get a new Activation ID, please use a different email address.
You will then receive an email from Invixium Support. Follow the steps in the email to activate IXM WEB.
{!Case.Thread_Id}
